articles.title: „Wäre falsch, wenn Ukrainer denselben Fehler machen, den die Russen permanent machen“
articles.image_title: DIESES FOTO WIRD VON DER RUSSISCHEN STAATSAGENTUR TASS ZUR VERFÜGUNG GESTELLT. [BELGOROD, RUSSIA - JULY 3, 2022: Emergency service workers stand among the ruins of a building destroyed. According to Belgorod Region Governor Vyacheslav Gladkov, the local air defence system supposedly responded. Preliminary data indicates a house on Mayakovskogo Street caught fire, eleven apartment buildings are partially destroyed, at least 39 single-family houses are damaged. The exact cause is not known yet, all emergency services involved, three reported dead and four injured. Yevgeny Silantyev/TASS]
